note.q: Irregularly numbered. Handwritten notes and corrections throughout the letters; paper slip with handwritten notes. Includes a photocopy of an original manuscript letter, two copies of its typewritten transcription and two copies of typewritten transcription of crossed out sentences only throughout the manuscript. Includes a copy of a contract between Arch√§ologisches Institut in Rom and "Herrn H. Sch.", forwarded by Henzen to Gerhard. One letter includes an attached letter written by Braun to Gerhard. Includes a letter from Henzen to Minister Von Raumer, forwarded to Gerhard.
